content.raw:
Done in eb6cd25. It's hard at the moment to tell apart the case when the server is invalid and when it is empty, so I'm printing a message that explains that, and the messages before should give hints:

~~~
$ ign fuel list -t model -u banana && echo "shouldn't get here"
Fetching model list from banana...
[Err] [REST.cc:206] Error in REST request

libcurl: (6) Could not resolve host: banana
Either failed to fetch model list, or server has no models yet.
~~~
content.html:
Done in eb6cd25. It's hard at the moment to tell apart the case when the server is invalid and when it is empty, so I'm printing a message that explains that, and the messages before should give hints:

$ ign fuel list -t model -u banana && echo "shouldn't get here"
Fetching model list from banana...
[Err] [REST.cc:206] Error in REST request

libcurl: (6) Could not resolve host: banana
Either failed to fetch model list, or server has no models yet.
